description: Businesses use X-Genics eManager, and its associated dashboard and SmartApps, to monitor and report on business performance and processes. As part of this monitoring, users can enter data in X-Genics forms. When a user enters data in an X-Genics form, that data is saved as an XEF file, for later use and review.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .xef file in E-merge WinAce
images.caption: XEF file open in E-merge WinAce
